name: CKFetchNotificationChangesOperation
desc: An operation that retrieves unread notifications from a CloudKit container.

items.name: init(previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken?)
items.desc: Creates an operation for fetching notification changes that occur after the specified change token.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an operation for fetching notification changes.

items.name: var previousServerChangeToken: CKServerChangeToken?
items.desc: The change token from a previous fetch operation.

items.name: var resultsLimit: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of results to fetch with the operation.

items.name: var moreComing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether more notifications are available.

items.name: var notificationChangedBlock: ((CKNotification) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block that processes a single push notification.

items.name: var fetchNotificationChangesCompletionBlock: ((CKServerChangeToken?, Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block that executes after the system fetches all requested notifications.
